trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Palm Bay
There were no other sightings in Palm Bay on or around September 10th 2009
Summary: A bright light traveled S.at a very high rate of speed,stopping,backing up,going straight up,back down,then went south again.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approx.3:20-3:25pm on Sept.10th,2009,I saw from my dock in Malabar,Fl. a white light traveling at a high rate of speed over the barrier island,or close to it(Melbourne Beach area)Then it stopped,backed up,went straight up then back down and continued heading south.(This occured approx.over the South Shores condominiums)I ran out to the end of my dock to get a better look and against a backround of dark clouds,I saw this object continue going south at a very high rate of speed.Before I lost sight of it,it appeared to shoot a beam of light towards the ground,but it only lasted for a split second,then I lost sight of it,still heading south.This object was at a very low altitude(just over the condos) A note of interest....The Space Shuttle is due to land at Kennedy Space Center tonight at 7:05pm. Sincerely;John H.Logue
